text: Give me the top posts by stani in the past month
validResp:
SELECT *
FROM lens_publication_post_view
WHERE handle = 'stani.lens'
AND timestamp > (UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - 2592000)
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 10

text: Show me the top 5 posters on lens
validResp:
SELECT handle, COUNT(*) AS post_count
FROM lens_publication_post_view
GROUP BY handle
ORDER BY post_count DESC
LIMIT 10
